## IOperationExecutionResult.error property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The error which occurred while executing this operation, this is stored in case we need it later (for example to re-print errors at end of execution).

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly error: Error | undefined;
```
